reviewtext: This is a well thought out product, and a great "peripheral  brain". There is an incredible amount of software available for this  product-many of it free on the Net. I work at a hospital and use it to  store phone #, but it also has an entire PDR, and other medical data on it  I was able to download off the Net at pharmaceutical and medical sites. I  also looked at the new Pocket PC, which I found to be very good, but for  right now this is a cheaper PDA and does the job.
